analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: [GMS Status] The GMS score of 41 indicates a Neutral regime. Positive momentum pushed the score from 38, yet the market remains fragile. [Macro Root] While DXY (Dollar strength) eased, a 2.48% rise in VIX (Fear) reflects growing uncertainty. [Risk/Reward] High volatility in Crypto and AI-driven sector disruption in software/financials create a cautious variance. [Conclusion] Maintain a selective stance as the score balances between recovery and volatility despite liquidity stabilization.

reports.EN: [GMS Status] The GMS score of 41 indicates a Neutral regime. Positive momentum pushed the score from 38, yet the market remains fragile. [Macro Root] While DXY (Dollar strength) eased, a 2.48% rise in VIX (Fear) reflects growing uncertainty. [Risk/Reward] High volatility in Crypto and AI-driven sector disruption in software/financials create a cautious variance. [Conclusion] Maintain a selective stance as the score balances between recovery and volatility despite liquidity stabilization.
reports.ES: [Estado GMS] El GMS de 41 indica un rÃ©gimen Neutral. El impulso empujÃ³ la puntuaciÃ³n desde 38, sugiriendo una leve recuperaciÃ³n. [RaÃ­z Macro] El DXY (DÃ³lar/Liquidez) bajÃ³, pero el aumento del 2.48% en el VIX (Miedo) seÃ±ala fragilidad interna. [Riesgo/VariaciÃ³n] Las amenazas de la IA en software y finanzas generan vientos en contra significativos para la renta variable. [ConclusiÃ³n] Aunque el sistema sale de la zona defensiva, el aumento de la volatilidad exige una postura cautelosa y selectiva ahora mismo.

reports.ID: [Status GMS] Skor GMS 41 menunjukkan rezim Netral. Momentum mendorong skor naik dari 38, mencerminkan pemulihan kecil. [Akar Makro] Meskipun DXY (Kekuatan Dolar) melemah, kenaikan VIX (Ketakutan) sebesar 2,48% menunjukkan ketidakpastian tinggi. [Risiko/Imbalan] Ancaman AI pada sektor perangkat lunak dan keuangan menciptakan hambatan struktural yang signifikan saat ini. [Kesimpulan] Pertahankan sikap selektif karena skor berada di ambang volatilitas, meskipun ada upaya stabilisasi likuiditas global.

reports.DE: [GMS-Status] Ein Score von 41 signalisiert ein neutrales Regime. Das Momentum schob den Wert von 38 auf 41. [Makro-Logik] WÃ¤hrend der DXY (Dollarkraft) nachgab, deutet der Anstieg des VIX (Angst) um 2,48 % auf wachsende InstabilitÃ¤t hin. [Risiko/Chance] KI-Bedrohungen im Software- und Finanzsektor wirken als erhebliche BremsklÃ¶tze fÃ¼r die Erholung. [Fazit] Trotz der leichten Score-Verbesserung ist aufgrund der Sektorenrotation und der VolatilitÃ¤t eine defensive und sehr selektive Haltung ratsam.
reports.FR: [Statut GMS] Le score de 41 indique un rÃ©gime Neutre. Le momentum a poussÃ© le score de 38 Ã  41, montrant une fragile stabilisation. [Racine Macro] Le DXY (Dollar) a faibli, mais la hausse de 2,48% du VIX (Peur) confirme une incertitude latente. [Risque/Rendement] Les menaces de l'IA sur les logiciels et la finance crÃ©ent des vents contraires majeurs pour les indices. [Conclusion] Maintenez une approche sÃ©lective ; bien que le score s'amÃ©liore, la volatilitÃ© sectorielle impose une prudence rigoureuse.
